item.title: 澳大利亚电信公司 Vocus 获政府批准进行 TPG 电信交易
item.description: 澳大利亚 TPG 电信公司周一表示，麦格理支持的 Vocus 集团以 52.5 亿澳元（34.2 亿美元）收购 TPG 的企业、政府和批发固网及光纤资产的交易已获得最终批准。【原文：Australia's TPG Telecom said on Monday that Macquarie-backed Vocus Group has secured the final approval for its A$5.25 billion ($3.42 billion) acquisition of TPG's enterprise, government and wholesale fixed-line and fibre assets.】

item.title: 德国 5 月工业产值增幅高于预期
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周一称，得益于汽车工业和能源生产，德国 5 月份工业生产增幅高于预期。【原文：German industrial production rose more than expected in May thanks to the automotive industry and energy production, the federal statistics office said on Monday.】

item.title: 华为人工智能实验室否认其盘古模型抄袭阿里巴巴的 Qwen
item.description: 华为人工智能研究部门否认了盘古Pro大语言模型抄袭阿里巴巴模型的说法，称该模型是独立开发和训练的。【原文：Huawei's artificial intelligence research division has rejected claims that a version of its Pangu Pro large language model has copied elements from an Alibaba model, saying that it was independently developed and trained.】

item.title: 要求中国家庭部门成为更大经济驱动力的呼声日益高涨
item.description: 在贸易紧张局势和通货紧缩威胁中国经济前景之际，中国政府顾问正加紧呼吁将家庭部门对更广泛经济增长的贡献作为北京即将出台的五年政策计划的重中之重。【原文：Chinese government advisers are stepping up calls to make the household sector's contribution to broader economic growth a top priority at Beijing's upcoming five-year policy plan, as trade tensions and deflation threaten the outlook.】

item.title: 法国凯捷将以 33 亿美元收购外包公司 WNS
item.description: 法国 IT 服务公司凯捷（Capgemini）已同意以 33 亿美元的现金收购技术外包公司 WNS，以利用其 Agentic AI 产品为寻求业务流程转型的公司提供服务。【原文：French IT services firm Capgemini has agreed to buy technology outsourcing company WNS for a cash payment of $3.3 billion to capitalize on their Agentic AI offerings for companies seeking to transform their business processes.】

item.title: Jio BlackRock 通过首次发行共同基金募集超过 21 亿美元资金
item.description: Jio BlackRock 资产管理公司周一表示，它已通过三个现金或债务共同基金计划募集了超过 21 亿美元的资金，这是它自 5 月份获得牌照以来首次发行基金。【原文：Jio BlackRock Asset Management said on Monday it has raised more than $2.1 billion across three cash or debt mutual fund schemes, its first offering since getting the licence in May.】

item.title: 特朗普的信和谁在说话？关税最后期限临近时的局势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，他的政府即将在未来几天内敲定几项贸易协定，并将在7月9日前通知其他国家提高关税税率，提高的税率定于8月1日生效。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday his administration is close to finalizing several trade agreements in the coming days and will notify other countries of higher tariff rates by July 9, with the higher rates scheduled to take effect on August 1.】

item.title: 条款表显示，日产汽车计划出售 40 亿美元债券
item.description: 据路透社查阅的条款表显示，日本日产汽车公司正酝酿发行价值 40 亿美元的美元和欧元高级无担保债券。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor is eyeing $4 billion worth of dollar and euro senior unsecured bond issuances, according to term sheet reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普在贸易问题上玩弄三张牌的把戏，令人懊恼不已
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 美国与韩国贸易谈判的议题包括大型技术规则和农业问题
item.description: 韩国是最早开始与美国进行贸易谈判的国家之一，当时双方在 4 月份同意制定一个旨在取消关税的一揽子计划，但韩国现在正在寻求延长将于 7 月 9 日到期的为期 90 天的 25% 关税暂停期。【原文：South Korea was one of the first countries to start U.S. trade talks when both sides agreed in April to craft a package aimed at removing tariffs, but it is now seeking an extension to the 90-day pause on 25% tariffs set to expire on July 9.】

item.title: 财政部长称泰国已向美国提交最新贸易提案
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）周一表示，泰国已向美国提交了最新的贸易提案，泰国正努力阻止美国对其最大出口市场征收高额关税。【原文：Thailand has submitted its latest trade proposal to the United States, its finance minister Pichai Chunhavajira said on Monday, as it tries to head off steep tariffs from its largest export market.】

item.title: 特朗普称与金砖国家 "反美政策 "接轨将招致额外 10%关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，与金砖国家的 "反美政策 "保持一致的国家将被征收 10%的额外关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said that countries aligning themselves with the "Anti-American policies" of BRICS, will be charged an additional 10% tariff.】

item.title: 特朗普称将从周一下午起向其他国家发出关税信函
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日晚些时候表示，美国将从美东时间周一中午12:00（格林尼治标准时间16:00）开始向其他国家发送关税信函。【原文：President Donald Trump said late on Sunday that the U.S. will start delivering tariff letters to other countries starting 12:00 pm ET (1600 GMT) on Monday.】

item.title: 从卡拉奇到加沙：巴基斯坦初创企业为战争幸存儿童运送假肢
item.description: 八岁的西德拉-阿尔-博尔迪尼（Sidra Al Bordeeni）刚从诊所带着假肢回来，就跳上了她居住的约旦难民营的一辆自行车，这是自一年前加沙导弹袭击夺走她的手臂以来，她第一次骑自行车。【原文：As soon as eight-year-old Sidra Al Bordeeni returned from the clinic with her prosthetic arm, she jumped on a bicycle in the Jordanian refugee camp where she lives, riding for the first time since a missile strike in Gaza took her arm a year ago.】

item.title: 美国关税引发混乱，石油价格下滑，亚洲股市下滑
item.description: 亚洲股市在一片混乱中下滑，因为美国官员表示将推迟征收关税，但未能提供任何细节或文件来说明这一变化，而油价则因欧佩克+打开供应水龙头的力度超出预期而下滑。【原文：Stock markets slipped in Asia amid much confusion as U.S. officials flagged a delay on tariffs but failed to provide any detail or paperwork on the change, while oil prices slid as OPEC+ opened the supply spigots more than expected.】

item.title: 韩国 LG 能源解决方案公司称第二季度利润可能同比增长 152
item.description: 为通用汽车和特斯拉提供电动汽车电池的韩国 LG 能源解决方案公司（LGES）周一预计，其季度营业利润将增长 152%。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution (LGES) , an electric car battery supplier for General Motors and Tesla , on Monday estimated a 152% rise in its quarterly operating profit.】

item.title: 日本 5 月实际工资创近两年最大降幅
item.description: 日本政府周一公布的数据显示，日本 5 月份实际工资创下近两年来最快降幅，原因是持续通胀继续超过工资增长，阻碍了世界第四大经济体以消费为主导的经济增长。【原文：Japanese real wages in May fell at the fastest pace in nearly two years as persistent inflation continued to outpace wage growth and hinder consumption-led growth in the world's fourth-largest economy, government data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税最后期限临近，美元逼近多年低点
item.description: 周一，美元兑欧元汇率徘徊在2021年以来的最低点附近，美元兑瑞郎汇率则创下2015年以来的最弱水平，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税最后期限倒计时之际，交易员们对任何与贸易有关的头条新闻都保持着警觉。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered near its lowest since 2021 against the euro and the weakest since 2015 versus the Swiss franc on Monday, with traders alert for any trade-related headlines in the countdown to President Donald Trump's tariff deadline.】

item.title: 由于人工智能芯片销售疲软，三星电子第二季度利润可能下降 39
item.description: 受延迟向人工智能芯片领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）供应先进存储芯片的影响，三星电子周二预计第二季度营业利润将大跌 39%。【原文：Samsung Electronics is expected to forecast a 39% plunge in second-quarter operating profit on Tuesday, weighed down by delays in supplying advanced memory chips to artificial intelligence chip leader Nvidia .】

item.title: 德勤调查显示，英国公司对美国投资失去兴趣
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，在英国企业高管眼中，美国作为投资目的地的吸引力已大幅下降，他们现在认为机会离本土更近。【原文：The attractiveness of the United States as an investment destination has plunged in the eyes of British business executives who now see opportunities closer to home, a survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 欧佩克+加速增产后石油下滑 1
item.description: 石油输出国组织（OPEC+）加速提高产量并引发对供应过剩的担忧后，油价在周一交易开始时下滑了 1%。【原文：Oil prices slipped 1% at the start of trading on Monday after OPEC+ accelerated output hikes and raised concerns about oversupply.】

item.title: 美国商务部长卢特尼克表示关税将于 8 月 1 日生效
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，已与贸易伙伴达成了一些贸易协议，并将发函通知其他国家提高关税税率。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said some trade deals had been made with trading partners and letters would go out to other countries notifying them of higher tariff rates.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，TikTok 将在美国发售新版应用程序
item.description: 据 The Information 周日报道，在计划将 TikTok 出售给一批投资者之前，TikTok 正在为美国用户开发一个新版本的应用程序。【原文：TikTok is building a new version of its app for users in the United States ahead of a planned sale of the app to a group of investors, The Information reported on Sunday.】

item.title: X 在 "法律要求 "后暂停路透社在印度的账户，政府否认提出要求
item.description: 路透社无法立即确定该要求所指的具体内容、要求删除内容的原因或提出投诉的实体。【原文：Reuters could not immediately determine what specific content the demand referred to, why its removal was sought or the entity that had lodged the complaint.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：泰国将向美国提供更多贸易优惠以避免 36% 的关税
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）周日告诉彭博新闻社，泰国在其避免美国征收高额关税的最新提案中提出，泰国的目标是提高与美国的双边贸易额，并在五年内将其460亿美元的贸易顺差减少70%，在七至八年内实现平衡。【原文：Thailand, in its latest proposal to avert steep U.S. tariffs, is aiming to boost bilateral trade volumes with the U.S. and reduce its $46 billion trade surplus by 70% within five years, reaching balance in seven to eight years, Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira told Bloomberg News on Sunday.】

item.title: 贝森特：美国接近达成多项贸易协议，将于近日宣布
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周日表示，在7月9日提高关税的最后期限到来之前，美国即将达成几项贸易协议，并预测未来几天将有几项重大消息公布。【原文：The United States is close to clinching several trade deals ahead of a July 9 deadline when higher tariffs kick in, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Sunday, predicting several big announcements in coming days.】

item.title: 金砖国家领导人呼吁保护数据，防止未经授权使用人工智能
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份声明草案，由发展中国家组成的金砖国家集团领导人将呼吁防止未经授权使用人工智能（AI），避免过度收集数据，并允许建立公平支付机制。【原文：Leaders of the BRICS group of developing nations will call for protections against unauthorized use of artificial intelligence (AI) to avoid excessive data collection and allow mechanisms for fair payment, according to a draft statement seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，日产考虑向富士康输出电动汽车，以避免 Oppama 倒闭
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周日援引一位不愿透露姓名的日产汽车消息人士的话报道，日产汽车正在与台湾富士康商讨电动汽车合作事宜，这可能会使其位于日本的Oppama工厂免于关闭。【原文：Nissan Motor is in discussions with Taiwan's Foxconn about a collaboration in electric vehicles that could save its Oppama plant in Japan from closure, the Nikkei business daily reported on Sunday, citing an unidentified Nissan source.】

item.title: 投资者在特朗普关税最后期限到来之际感到麻木和茫然
item.description: 周三是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收贸易关税的最后期限，全球投资者对此显然并不感到兴奋，而是做好了准备，应对一系列他们认为已被计入价格的良性局面。【原文：Global investors are heading into U.S. President Donald Trump's Wednesday deadline for trade tariffs palpably unexcited and prepared for a range of benign scenarios that they believe are already priced in.】

item.title: 马斯克计划举办政党活动后，投资公司 Azoria 推迟了特斯拉 ETF 的发行
item.description: Azoria 准备在下周推出特斯拉 ETF，投资于这家电动汽车公司的股票和期权。【原文：Azoria was set to launch the Tesla ETF, which would invest in the electric vehicle company's shares and options, next week.】
